column4: hey all my 11.04 ubuntu wont reboot it will shutdown no problem but when I run reboot I see ubuntu and 2 red dots and 3 white dots? or the screen fills with text oddly part of it says Broadcast message from root@machine (unknown) at 15:18 last thing it says is Checking for running unattended-upgrades: * Asking all remaining processes to terminate... [OK ]
you make any recent changes?
its a fresh install
so this has been happening since the initial install
